dynamic_line.no: Nice to see a new face around here, you one of us?  Welcome to the club, try not to step on anyone's toes.

responses.text: Nice to meet you.  Can't stick around though.
Hate to run, but I gotta go.  See ya.

dynamic_line: I've got <name_b>s to beat up, not much time to talk.

responses.text: Anything that you need done around here?
Who exactly are you guys anyway?
What do you do these days?
Could you loan a poor soul any supplies?
Would you like to buy anything?

dynamic_line: Some people call us thieves, others scum, the <swear> government calls us the Hell's Raiders.  We're just some folks doin' what we need to survive is all.

responses.text: How'd you get to be called the "Hell's Raiders"?
What do you do these days?

dynamic_line: Surely you've heard of the old biker gang, the Hell's Angels?  A few of our head honchos used to run with 'em, so they named us based off that.

responses.text: What do you do these days?

dynamic_line: Ain't it in our name?  We raid!  Take stuff, loot the old <swear> cities, take down the <swear> government, get on top!

responses.text: Who exactly are you guys anyway?

dynamic_line: Cause it's the only way to live!  For too long before <the_cataclysm>, the <swear> government didn't realize how much it oppressed people like us.  The weak <name_b>s got all the good stuff, while the strong were kept back.  Now we're on top, as the natural order of things should be.  Way I see it, that's the only <swear> way to live, the way nature goes.

responses.text: I'll take your word for it.
You're <swear> crazy <name_b>!  Let's see who's the strongest then!

dynamic_line: Listen <name_b>, we don't like <swear> bums around here.  If you want somethin', get off your <swear> rear and work for it!  <get_lost>
No, I don't have the money to buy anything.  Go see someone else about it.
